title: ConvTranspose2d + autograd.grad + backward causes "RuntimeError: cuDNN requires contiguous weight tensor"
body_html:
Minimal test script:

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

a = Variable(torch.rand(10, 3, 5, 5).cuda(), requires_grad = True)
deconv = nn.ConvTranspose2d(3, 10, 3, 1, 1).cuda()
b = deconv(a)
c = b.mean()
g = torch.autograd.grad(outputs = c, inputs = a, retain_graph = True, create_graph = True, only_inputs = True)[0]
loss = g.mean()
loss.backward()

body:
Minimal test script:

```
import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

a = Variable(torch.rand(10, 3, 5, 5).cuda(), requires_grad = True)
deconv = nn.ConvTranspose2d(3, 10, 3, 1, 1).cuda()
b = deconv(a)
c = b.mean()
g = torch.autograd.grad(outputs = c, inputs = a, retain_graph = True, create_graph = True, only_inputs = True)[0]
loss = g.mean()
loss.backward()
```
